articles.author: Julian Duplain, Grace Moon, Kareem Fahim, Robyn Dixon, Claire Parker
articles.title: Ukraine Live Briefing: Grain deal signed in Turkey; U.S. to send Ukraine more artillery
articles.description: The United Nations says a deal Turkey has brokered between Russia and Ukraine will be signed later Friday to allow exports of grain from blockaded Ukrainian ports.
articles.content: The United Nations says a deal Turkey has brokered between Russia and Ukraine will be signed later Friday to allow exports of grain from blockaded Ukrainian ports.

articles.title: Steve Bannon Found Guilty of Contempt Related to Jan. 6 Inquiry
articles.description: He is the first close aide to former President Donald J. Trump to be convicted as a result of one of the investigations into the Jan. 6 attack.

articles.title: Biden's doctor: President's Covid symptoms 'have improved'
articles.description: The 79-year-old president still has only mild symptoms, his White House physician says.

articles.title: Oppressive and dangerous heat will continue all weekend across the US: Here's your forecast

articles.title: Special board meeting to consider firing Uvalde schools police chief Pete Arredondo is canceled
articles.description: A special school board meeting scheduled for Saturday morning in Uvalde, Texas, to consider whether to terminate the employment of the district's police chief is canceled, the district announced Friday.

articles.title: Newsom signs California gun bill modeled after Texas abortion law
articles.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom on Friday signed a bill into law that allows private citizens to bring civil action against anyone who manufactures, distributes, transports or imports assault weapons or ghost guns, which are banned in the state.
